item.title: About Srikanth
item.description: Welcome! I am an information security professional with over 4 years of experience. My professional experience over this period include: Vulnerability Assessment and Penetration Testing Digital Forensics, Incident Response and Threat Hunting Big Data analytics and Cluster administration Security Software development - Product development as well as management My favourite sub-domains in information security are: Malware analysis Exploit development
